issue.title: Use a more stable and precise physics engine for the Atlas simulation, preferably based on a Featherstone algorithm

message.raw: We have ongoing work to integrate two Featherstone-based physics engines (Simbody and DART).  Those are big efforts, not easily tracked as a single ticket like this.  Watch for announcements on how to try out the next engines, and file new tickets as specific problems arise with thenm.
message.html: We have ongoing work to integrate two Featherstone-based physics engines (Simbody and DART). Those are big efforts, not easily tracked as a single ticket like this. Watch for announcements on how to try out the next engines, and file new tickets as specific problems arise with thenm.
